availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Geroge W. Wood (Nicholas County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married Sarah J. Kennedy Wood in Nicholas County, Kentucky, on April 7, 1848. Father of Mary S. Wood, William F. Wood, and Willis J. Wood. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1850. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, District No. 2, p. 415A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, District No. 2, p. 410.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Nicholas County Marriages, Film 000252392, p. 74.
